data.title: Largest airports and airlines in France
data.meta_description: The 30 biggest airports in France and 8 airlines with further information and data
data.text:
The 30 largest airports and airlines in France

Further information is provided on the 30 biggest airports in France. At Charles de Gaulle International Airport alone, 108 airlines operate and serve flights to and from 237 destinations.

Out of the eleven airlines of the country we have listed biggest 8. Air France is leading here with a total of 201 flight destinations.

› Transport + infrastructure in France

› The largest airports worldwide
